channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Empromptu raises $2M pre-seed to help enterprises build AI apps
item.description: Empromptu claims all a user has to do is tell the platform's AI chatbot what they want — like a new HTML or JavaScript app — and the AI will go ahead ...

item.title: Pebble’s founder introduces a $75 AI smart ring for recording brief notes with a press of a button
item.description: After rebooting the Pebble smartwatch, founder Eric Migicovsky is expanding his company's device lineup with a new smart wearable: an AI-powered smart...

item.title: America’s Biggest Bitcoin Miners Are Pivoting to AI
item.description: In the face of a profitability crisis, industrial-scale bitcoin miners are transforming their data centers into AI factories.

item.title: Anthropic and Accenture sign multi-year AI strategic partnership
item.description: The two companies are launching the Accenture Anthropic Business Group to bring Anthropic's AI to Accenture's employees.

item.title: Spotify launches music videos in the U.S. and Canada for Premium subscribers
item.description: Spotify will let you switch between music videos and audio at any time.

item.title: Mistral AI surfs vibe coding tailwinds with new coding models
item.description: French AI startup Mistral today launched Devstral 2, a new generation of its AI model designed for coding, as the company seeks to catch up to bigger ...

item.title: Dell Coupon Codes: 10% Off | December 2025
item.description: Get 10% off with verified Dell promo code, plus today’s coupons for up to $600 off laptops, Alienware monitors, and all things tech.

item.title: 50% Off Chewy Promo Code | December 2025
item.description: Explore Chewy coupon codes for 20% off pet food with holiday deals, a free $30 gift card, buy 2 get 1 free offers and more.

item.title: San Francisco Mayor Daniel Lurie: ‘We Are a City on the Rise’
item.description: Since taking office, San Francisco’s mayor has been on a quest to revitalize the city and increase public safety. He’s also kept the National Guard ou...

item.title: Can Bike Riders and Self-Driving Cars Be Friends?
item.description: Some cycling advocates are on board with robotaxis. Others see the self-driving car boom as perpetuating auto dependency.
